author: Chris Baynes, Chris Baynes
title: Coronavirus: Stray dogs eating bat meat could have sparked pandemic, scientist claims
description: Other researchers have rejected the findings and say dog owners do not need to be concerned
content:
Covid-19 could have been transmitted to humans by stray dogs which had eaten bat meat, according to a study.
The disease may have rapidly evolved in the intestines of dogs that consumed bats carrying an ancestor coronavirus, a Canadian biologist has proposed… [+4921 chars]
